Practical definition of love

Published by Ted on 01 Mar 2020. Contains tags related to: language  beauty 

While defining love seems silly, having a useful definition does not.

Love defined as the quality of attention you give to something is the most useful definition I have come across because it is measurable and correctable.

Yesterday I did not love my work. I was simply going through the motions - the quality of my attention was low and poor.
